\documentclass[english]{article}

\usepackage{babel}
\begin{document}
The PDE is 
\[
W(q,m,n)=-qW_{q}+nW_{m}+(K-n)W_{n}+\max(0,C[A-W(q,m,n)]-D)
\]

Simplified, but I don't think it affects the answer. Just removed
some multiplicative constants. Can be simplified further if it's easier
to think about, 
\[
W(q,m,n)=-qW_{q}+nW_{m}+(K-n)W_{n}+C[A-W(q,m,n)]-D
\]

\end{document}
